sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Electronic Arts ( EA ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Electronic Arts registers a 55.8% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Perrigo Company ( PRGO ), trading down 2.6%.
Perrigo Company is lower by about 9.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 1.9%, and Newmont Mining ( NEM ), trading up 1.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
